subject: Re: [junit] Re: Testing Private Methods
msgSnippet: Thanks, Dave. Great writeup. I now have a much better insight into TestCase as a reusable fixture . That s a good understanding to acquire, on general
messageBody:
Thanks, Dave. Great writeup.

I now have a much better insight into TestCase as a "reusable fixture".

That's a good understanding to acquire, on general principles.

But at this point I've lost track of how that discussion applies to
the problem of testing private methods.

What was your solution to that problem?
(thanks)
